name: Inefficient Collection Usage
description: Detects improper use of collections such as using LinkedList for random access, ArrayList for frequent insertions, or not specifying initial capacity for large collections.

examples.before:
List<User> users = new ArrayList<>();
// Adding 10000 users without initial capacity
examples.after:
List<User> users = new ArrayList<>(10000);
// Pre-sized to avoid multiple array resizing operations
